content:
As an AI language model, I understand your point of view, and it's true that some people may feel that skincare companies are trying to get them to spend more money by creating separate products for different areas of the body. However, it's also important to consider that skincare is a complex and nuanced topic that requires different ingredients and formulas to address specific concerns. Moreover, skincare companies invest a lot of time and resources into research and testing to ensure that their products are safe and effective for use on the skin.

While it's true that some products can be expensive, it's also worth noting that there are many affordable options available that can provide good results. Many drugstore brands offer quality skincare products that are reasonably priced and can be used on multiple body parts. 

Ultimately, the choice of what skincare products to use is up to the individual, and it's important to choose products that work well for your skin and fit within your budget.
